v0_prompt:
Create a comprehensive rental transaction detail page with the following specifications:

**Design Philosophy:**
- Clean, professional design with gold (#FFD700) accent color
- Flat modern minimalist approach with subtle neumorphism
- White background with rounded cards (rounded-lg) and soft shadows (shadow-md)
- Information hierarchy optimized for quick scanning and decision making

**Page Layout Structure:**
- Full-width header with transaction code and status
- Three-column layout on desktop: main content (60%), sidebar (25%), actions (15%)
- Two-column layout on tablet: main content (70%), sidebar (30%)
- Single column stack on mobile with collapsible sections

**Header Section:**
- Large transaction code (TXN-YYYYMMDD-XXX format)
- Status badge (Active/Overdue/Returned with appropriate colors)
- Created date and time
- Breadcrumb navigation
- Quick actions: Edit, Print, Delete (with confirmation)

**Main Content Areas:**

**1. Customer Information Card:**
- Customer name and contact details
- Address information
- Customer photo/avatar placeholder
- Registration date
- Total lifetime rentals count
- Edit customer button

**2. Rental Details Card:**
- Rental duration and dates (pickup/return)
- Auto-calculated return deadline with countdown timer
- Current status with visual indicator
- Late fee calculation if overdue
- Notes and special instructions

**3. Product Details Table:**
- Comprehensive product information:
  - Product name and code
  - Category and size
  - Quantity rented vs available stock
  - Individual product status
  - Condition notes
- Expandable rows for additional product details
- Product images in thumbnail gallery

**4. Payment Information Card:**
- Payment method with appropriate icon (QRIS/Cash/Transfer)
- Payment amount breakdown:
  - Base rental fee
  - Additional charges
  - Late fees (if applicable)
  - Total amount
- Payment status with timestamp
- Payment proof/receipt attachment option
- Payment history log

**5. Timeline/Activity Log:**
- Chronological activity feed:
  - Transaction created
  - Payment received
  - Items picked up
  - Due date reminders
  - Return date changes
  - Late fee applications
- Each entry with timestamp and user who performed action

**Sidebar Components:**

**1. Quick Actions Panel:**
- Mark as Returned button (gold primary)
- Extend Rental Duration
- Send Reminder (WhatsApp/SMS)
- Generate Invoice
- Add Payment

**2. Status Overview:**
- Days remaining/overdue counter
- Payment status indicator
- Return checklist
- Risk assessment (low/medium/high based on customer history)

**3. Related Information:**
- Customer's other active rentals
- Similar transactions history
- Recommended actions based on status

**Interactive Features:**
- Collapsible sections for mobile optimization
- In-line editing for certain fields (notes, payment status)
- Modal dialogs for critical actions (delete, extend rental)
- Real-time status updates
- Print-friendly version
- Export transaction details (PDF/Excel)

**Data Structure Example:**
```json
{
  "transactionCode": "TXN-20241122-001",
  "status": "active | overdue | returned",
  "customer": {
    "id": "string",
    "name": "Ardiansyah",
    "phone": "089657",
    "address": "Jl. Jendral",
    "email": "optional",
    "registrationDate": "date",
    "totalRentals": "number"
  },
  "rental": {
    "duration": 4,
    "pickupDate": "2024-11-22",
    "returnDate": "2024-11-26",
    "actualReturnDate": "date | null",
    "isOverdue": "boolean",
    "daysOverdue": "number",
    "lateFee": "number"
  },
  "products": [
    {
      "id": "string",
      "name": "Baju",
      "code": "product_code",
      "category": "clothing",
      "size": "L",
      "quantity": 1,
      "totalAvailable": 5,
      "condition": "good | fair | poor",
      "notes": "string"
    }
  ],
  "payment": {
    "method": "QRIS | Cash | Transfer",
    "baseAmount": "number",
    "lateFees": "number",
    "totalAmount": "number",
    "status": "paid | unpaid | partial",
    "paidAmount": "number",
    "paidDate": "date",
    "paymentProof": "string (file URL)"
  },
  "timeline": [
    {
      "action": "string",
      "timestamp": "datetime",
      "user": "string",
      "details": "string"
    }
  ]
}
```

**Status-Based Features:**
- Active: Show countdown timer, send reminder options
- Overdue: Highlight late fees, urgent return actions
- Returned: Show return confirmation, condition assessment

**Technical Requirements:**
- Responsive design with mobile-first approach
- Real-time data updates (WebSocket/polling)
- Offline capability for viewing (service worker)
- Print stylesheet optimization
- Accessibility compliance (WCAG AA)
- Loading states and error handling

**Component Architecture:**
- Use shadcn/ui components as foundation
- Custom components: TransactionHeader, CustomerCard, ProductTable, PaymentCard, ActivityTimeline
- Icons from Lucide React
- Date formatting with relative time display

**Color Coding:**
- Active rentals: Blue (#3B82F6)
- Overdue: Red (#EF4444) with warning indicators
- Returned: Green (#10B981)
- Payment pending: Yellow (#F59E0B)
- Gold accent: Action buttons and highlights

**Performance Considerations:**
- Lazy loading for product images and timeline data
- Virtualized scrolling for large product lists
- Optimistic UI updates for quick actions
- Cached customer and product data

The page should provide cashiers with comprehensive information while maintaining clean visual hierarchy and efficient workflow for managing rental transactions.

status_logic.returned: Actual return date exists, show completion status
